import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { fetchReposAction, fetchProfileAction, } from "./redux/slices/reposSlice"; import imgPic from "./img/gith.svg"; import { useState } from "react"; function App() { const [user, setUser] = useState(""); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchReposAction("tweneboah")); dispatch(fetchProfileAction("tweneboah")); }, []); const repos = useSelector(state => state?.repos); const { loading, profileLoading, reposList, profile } = repos; console.log(repos); return ( <>
{/* Have a question? */}

GitHub Finder

{ setUser(e.target?.value); dispatch(fetchProfileAction(user)); }} type="text" name="email" id="email" className="shadow-sm text-center focus:ring-indigo-500 p-2 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm border-gray-300 w-full rounded-md lg:w-1/2" placeholder="Search For User" />
{profileLoading ? (

Loading

) : profile?.name === "Error" ? ( No User Found ) : (

Name:{" "} {profile?.name} {profile?.login}

Bio: {profile?.bio}

Company: {profile?.company}

Location: {profile?.location}

Followers: {profile?.followers}

Following: {profile?.following}

Repositories:{" "} {profile?.public_repos ? profile?.public_repos : "N/A"}

Gists:{" "} {profile?.public_gists ? profile?.public_gists : "N/A"}

View Profile
{reposList?.map(repo => ( <>
{repo?.name}
))}

Developed by i-Novotek

Watch the tutorial
)}
); } export default App;
